column4: can anyone please help me with the speed of other computer?  It is driving me nuts by taking minutes just to browse through directories or move the mouse.   it does running normally every now and then but it only lasts for a few seconds
is your disk drive running a lot?
how can i tell?  i do not have my hd light working... I have 3 physical SATA hardrives combined with RAID 5 (this is a samba computer used for nothing else but file server)
ah, not sure then. I was thinking you might have gotten into swap a lot
